summary: Comprehensive testing of admin inline editing feature on homepage. Found and fixed a critical bug where partial homepage content updates caused frontend crash. All 19 test cases passed after fix.

bugs_found_and_fixed.issue: Homepage crashed with 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading map)' when homepage content was partially updated
bugs_found_and_fixed.root_cause: Frontend didn't merge incoming API content with defaults - when only tagline was updated, social_feed_images was missing
bugs_found_and_fixed.fix_applied: Added merge logic in LinkTreeHomePage.jsx to merge API response with defaultContent, ensuring social_feed_images is always an array

critical_code_review_comments: Frontend properly handles partial API responses by merging with defaults
Admin bar correctly shows/hides based on admin token validity
Edit mode correctly displays editable inputs for tagline, phone, email, address
Social feed images show 'Click images to edit' hint in edit mode
Save Changes persists to backend API and shows success toast
Cancel correctly reverts changes without saving
Logout removes admin token and hides admin bar
seed_data_creation: None needed - test data cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin inline editing feature fully tested and working. Bug fix applied to handle partial content updates. All features work: admin bar, edit mode toggle, editable fields (tagline, phone, email, address), social feed image edit hint, save/cancel buttons, dashboard link, logout.

homepage_no_admin_bar.details: Homepage displays correctly for non-admin users without admin bar

admin_login.details: Admin login at /admin with username:admin, password:admin works correctly

admin_bar_appears.details: Admin bar appears on homepage after admin login with 'Admin Mode' text, Edit Page button, Dashboard link, Logout button

edit_page_button.details: Edit Page button toggles edit mode correctly

edit_mode_tagline_input.details: Edit mode shows editable input field for tagline with data-testid='edit-tagline-input'

edit_mode_phone_input.details: Edit mode shows editable input field for phone with data-testid='edit-phone-input'

edit_mode_email_input.details: Edit mode shows editable input field for email with data-testid='edit-email-input'

edit_mode_address_input.details: Edit mode shows editable input field for address with data-testid='edit-address-input'

edit_mode_image_hint.details: Edit mode shows 'Click images to edit' hint for social feed images

save_changes_button.details: Save Changes button appears in edit mode with data-testid='save-homepage-btn'

save_changes_functionality.details: Save Changes saves content to backend API (PUT /api/admin/homepage/content), shows success toast, and exits edit mode

save_changes_persistence.details: Saved changes persist to database - verified via GET /api/homepage/content

cancel_button.details: Cancel button appears in edit mode and reverts changes when clicked

cancel_reverts_changes.details: Cancel correctly reverts changes without saving to backend

logout_button.details: Logout button removes admin session and shows 'Logged Out - Admin session ended' toast

logout_removes_token.details: Logout removes admin token from localStorage

logout_hides_admin_bar.details: Logout hides admin bar from homepage

api_put_homepage_content.details: PUT /api/admin/homepage/content updates homepage content with admin auth
